territory.notes: Kosovoâ€™s parliament declared independence in 2008. The U.S. Government recognized Kosovo and extended diplomatic relations on February 18, 2008. Under the auspices of UN Security Council Resolution 1244, the United Nations assumed responsibility for civil and military matters in Kosovo in 1999. The role of UNIAMK was reduced as conditions warranted and the government of Kosovo assumed essentially all government functions from September 2012 onward.
